owltools.ncbi

Class NCBIOWL

  • java.lang.Object
    • owltools.ncbi.OWLConverter
      • owltools.ncbi.NCBIConverter
        • owltools.ncbi.NCBIOWL

  • public class NCBIOWL
extends NCBIConverter
    Provides static methods for creating and initializing an OWLOntology into which taxa can be inserted.
    Author:
    James A. Overton

    • Method Detail

      • createOWLOntology

        public static org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLOntology createOWLOntology()
                                                                  throws org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLOntologyCreationException
        Create and initialize the ontology. This involves adding several annotation properties from OboInOwl and has_rank, adding the ranks themselves, and setting annotation properties on the ontology itself.
        Returns:
        the ontology, ready for adding taxa
        Throws:
        org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLOntologyCreationException
        See Also:
        Obo2OWLConstants.Obo2OWLVocabulary

      • setupAltIdProperty

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        annotation property
        See Also:

      • addAltId

        public static void addAltId(org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLOntology ontology,
            String merged,
            String altId,
            org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLAnnotationProperty ap)
        Add an alternative identifier for a main term.
        Parameters:
        ontology -
        merged - the main term
        altId - the alternate id to be added
        ap - annotation property as generated by the setup method
        See Also:
        setupAltIdProperty(OWLOntology)

        public static org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLOntology loadOWLOntology(File inputFile)
                                                                throws org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLOntologyCreationException
        Load an ontology from a file.
        Parameters:
        inputFile - the path to the OWL file
        Returns:
        the loaded ontology
        Throws:
        org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLOntologyCreationException - if the ontology can't be loaded
